channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Warren Buffet-backed BYD’s ultra-affordable EVs are struggling in one market: Japan
item.description: BYD’s sales have been lukewarm since entering the Japanese passenger vehicle market, where it faces a rebound in the popularity of hybrids and loyalty to domestic brands like Toyota.

item.title: Microsoft's 'abusive' bundling of Teams and Office products breached antitrust rules, EU says
item.description: The European Union on Tuesday accused Microsoft of breaching antitrust rules with the "abusive" bundling of its Teams and Office products.

item.title: Airbus shares drop 10% after cutting guidance, warns of fewer deliveries
Top investor dubs U.K. a ‘banana economy’ with a ‘build absolutely nothing anywhere near anything’ mantra
item.description: PIC says the U.K.'s stunted planning policy is leaving $250 billion for viable projects unused.

item.title: Tuesday's analyst calls: Goldman Sachs says Disney is a buy, Uber to surge nearly 25%
item.description: A media giant and a sports betting company were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Tuesday.

item.title: Trump beats Biden for ‘king of debt’ title as market braces for bond crush
Netflix wants managers to ask themselves whether they would rehire their current employees—and fire them, if the answer is ‘no’
item.description: "We encourage everyone to speak to their managers about what’s going well and what’s not on a regular basis. This helps avoid surprises."

item.title: Cisco is 'very optimistic' about its expanding business with China EVs
item.description: Cisco is "very optimistic" about its growing business with Chinese electric car companies as they expand overseas, Cisco's Greater China head Ming Wong told CNBC.

item.title: Julian Assange to plead guilty in deal with U.S. and return to Australia
The U.K.’s wine business is booming, so much so that Britain’s largest winemaker is considering putting itself up for sale to fund expansion
item.description: Founded 22 years ago, Chapel Down has witnessed the U.K.’s wine business boom as climate change wreaked havoc on other traditional wine-producing hubs.

item.title: China’s Chang’e-6 lunar probe returns with first-ever samples from far side of the moon
item.description: China's Chang'e-6 lunar probe returned to Earth on Tuesday, bringing back the first-ever samples from the far side of the moon.

item.title: Student-debt relief plan blocked in part by two federal courts
Hip-hop star Megan Thee Stallion is promoting Amazon’s 10th annual Prime Day with a new original song called—surprise—‘It’s Prime Day’
item.description: On Tuesday, the rapper unveiled a new original song called “It’s Prime Day.” An accompanying music video shows her purchasing a pink dog collar, fake eyelashes and other items from Amazon.

item.title: Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight loss drug approved in China
item.description: Novo Nordisk said Tuesday that its Wegovy weight loss treatment has been approved in China for long-term weight management.

item.title: Larry Summers says the Fed and investors are ‘badly wrong’ on inflation’s path
